text: ثم جعل نسله من سللة من ماء مهين

translations.translation: Then made his offspring from the extract of base fluid,
then made his progeny from the extract of a mean fluid,
He made His offspring come into existence from an extract of insignificant fluid,
Then kept his posterity with a part of an abject fluid.
Then He made his offspring from semen of despised water.
Then He made his progeny of an extract, of water held in light estimation.
then He fashioned his progeny of an extraction of mean water,
Then He made his seed from a draught of despised fluid;
then He made his progeny from an extract of a humble fluid.
Then He made his progeny from an extract of water base.
Then He made his progeny from an extract of a base fluid.
And made his progeny from a quintessence of the nature of a fluid despised:
Then He made his offspring from semen of worthless water (male and female sexual discharge).
then He made his offspring from a clot of weak water (semen).
Then made his reproduction from an extract of an insignificant fluid.
Then He made his posterity out of the extract of a liquid disdained.
[32:8] then He made his progeny, his offspring, from an extract, a blood clot, of a base, delicate, fluid, namely, the sperm-drop;
(Then He made his seed) his offspring (from a drought of despised fluid) from a weak drop of the water of man and woman;

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { ثُمَّ جَعَلَ نَسْلَهُ مِن سُلاَلَةٍ مِّن مَّآءٍ مَّهِينٍ } السُّلالةُ صَفوةُ المَاءِ
 وقالَ مما خَرَجَ هُراقتهُ
 ومَّهينٌ: ضَعيفٌ رَقيقٌ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { ثُمَّ } بعد تعلق إرادته سبحانه بإبقاء نوعه { جَعَلَ نَسْلَهُ } أي: قدر بصنعه وجود ذرياته المتناسلة المتكثرة، المختلفة منه على سبيل التعاقب والترادف { مِن سُلاَلَةٍ } فضله منفصلة مني، كائنة { مِّن مَّآءٍ مَّهِينٍ } [السجدة: 8] ممتهن مسترذل مستقذر؛ لخروجه عن مجرى الفضلة

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: ثم { بدأ خَلْقَ الإنسان } آدم { من طين ثم جعل نسله } ذريته { من سلالةٍ } أي: نطفة مسلولة من سائر البدن، { من ماءٍ } أي: مَنِيٍّ، وهو بدل من سلالة، { مِّهِينٍ } ضعيف حقير
